responses: Hi there, how can I help you?

I can guide you through prediction result suggestions, suggestions for improvements, module selection for your A/L's, emergency contact details and I can provide some basic knowledge related to your modules
please specify your predicted results percentage

__Category- Poor__Your overall academic performance level is not in a good stage to pass the examination. So, Please do some hard work on all Modules, please learn as much as possible, you must work hard in-order to pass the examinations and you must have to spend more time on applying the theoretical knowledge you gained by doing practicals. For more information regarding tutorials please refer our Study Material referencer to find good study materials

__Category- Average__Your overall academic performance level is somehow better to obtain just pass grade but if you really want a better results Please do some hard works on all including special concerns on Mathematics, Science, English and History, you have to spend some more hours to have a good results. For more information regarding tutorials please refer our Study Material referencer to find good study materials

__Category- Good__Your overall academic performance level is Good but if you really spend some more hours you can obtain a good grade in all subjects and Please make sure to work hard on Science, History and Mathematics, For more information regarding tutorials please refer our Study Material referencer to find good study materials

__Category- Excellent__Your overall academic performance level is too good but Please continue, maintain your progress works on all Modules as before and if you can concentrate more then you can achieve big level of good results. For more information regarding tutorials please refer our Study Material referencer to find good study materials
Please select your preferred module from the following in which you got 75% or above for last 2 terms:   A.Maths   B.Science   C.IT   D.History   E.Technology   F.Tamil   G.Commerce
You can either go with Maths Stream or Commerce stream in Advance Level
You can choose Biology as your Stream in Advance Level
You can choose Arts as your Stream in Advance Level
You can either go with Technology Stream or IT stream in Advance Level
